Works just fine as long as you follow these steps:

Make sure that you use one of the serial keys from the 'readme' file

Make sure that you copy the cracked content to SWAT4/Content/System BEFORE you start the game

That's all it really is that simple. And btw there's no real threat, this means; no trojan :)
